dialogue_turns.text: So, B, I was, like, reading up on some interesting stuff from 2020...

dialogue_turns.text: Wow, the Head of State? That's, um, that's a pretty high-level discussion for a tech company.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, definitely innovations. And, like, future development prospects too.
